attributes.action: reduce the amount of VAT on fuel immediately to ease the burden on motorists and businesses before we are crippled
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The rising cost of fuel is putting a crippling burden on the motorist. How much more are we expected to pay out when the cost of the fuel doesn't even compare to the amount we pay!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
